jobTitle: Sr. HRIS Reporting and Data Analytics Analyst
jobDescription: OverviewThis position will analyze and interpret data in order to support the objectives of the Human Resources department and our business partners. The Sr. HRIS Reporting and Analytics Analyst will compile reports, analyze and synthesize data in order to communicate key HR metrics to stakeholders in HR and other stakeholders in the company.
